column2: Request Papal Coronation

Enacting this decision will result in a request to the Pope for a coronation ceremony to be held at Rome in honour of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. This will allow [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to become crowned and blessed by the Pope and extend your authority as the Most Pious [Root.GetTitledFirstName], which further legitimises your rule.
Abdicate the Throne
Papal coronation

Enacting this decision will result in a request to the Pope for a coronation ceremony to be held at Rome in honour of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. This will allow [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to become crowned and blessed by the Pope and extend your authority as the ruler of your own kingdom, which further legitimises your rule.
Invite Steward to Court
Invite a promising nobleman to court, to aid with matters of administration.
Invite Chancellor to Court
Invite a promising nobleman to court, to aid with diplomatic affairs.
Invite Marshal to Court
Invite a promising nobleman to court, to help train your armies.
Invite Spymaster to Court
Invite a promising nobleman to court, to help run your spy network.
Request Contribution
We can try to levy an additional one time tax from all the vassals in the realm, at the expense of some prestige and relationship with our vassals
Extra Tax Contribution
Monarch Coronation
This monarch wants to be crowned in front of his fellow vassals.
Get a Concubine
Take a beautiful and young daughter of your realm as your concubine, inviting her at court.
Get a Lover
Take an handsome and young son of your realm as your lover, inviting him at court.
Switch Allegiance
Switch allegiance in the Investiture Contest between the Pope and the Holy Roman Emperor.
Switch Allegiance
Switch allegiance in the Investiture Contest between the Pope and the Holy Roman Emperor.
Pay Tribute to the Caliphate
However galling to admit, we are threatened by the heathens on our borders.  If we acknowledge their strength and pay them tribute, it may forestall outright invasion.
End Tribute
Enough of this insulting tribute!  We will pay it no longer!
Estabilish the Exchequer of Pleas
The Exchequer of Pleas or Court of Exchequer is a court that deals with matters of equity, a set of legal principles based on natural law and common law in England and Wales.
Estabilish the Court of Common Pleas
The Court of Common Pleas is a common law court in the English legal system that covers "common pleas": actions between subject and subject, which do not concern the king.
Issue the Charter of the Forest
The Charter of the Forest is a charter that re-establishes rights of access to the royal forest for free men.
Issue the Magna Carta Libertatum

The Magna Carta Libertatum is an English charter issued by the monarch who proclaims certain liberties, for example by explicitly accepting that no "freeman" can be punished except through the law of the land, and through some other concessions to the monarch's fellow subjects aimed at preserving and sometimes increasing their privileges. It is one of the first examples of a national statue or constitution.
Expel the Jews
Issue an edict promoting the expulsion of all the Jews of the realm.
Take a Loan
Go to the local Jewish community's moneylenders to ask for a loan with favorable terms.
Estabilish the Exchequer of the Jews
The Exchequer of the Jews (Latin: Scaccarium Judaeorum) was a division of the Court of Exchequer at Westminster, which recorded and regulated the taxes and the law-cases of the Jews in England.
Make a Royal Entry

The Royal Entry, also known by various other names, including Triumphal Entry and Joyous Entry, embraced the ceremonial and festivities accompanying a formal entry by a ruler or his representative into an important city (often the capital) in the Middle Ages and Early Modern Period in Europe. The entry centred on a procession carrying the entering prince into the city, where he was greeted and paid appropriate homage by the civic authorities. A feast and other celebrations would follow.
Estabilish the Imperial Diet
The Imperial Diet was the Diet, or general assembly, of the Imperial Estates of the Holy Roman Empire.
Estabilish the Estates General

The Estates General was a legislative assembly of the different classes of French subjects. It had a separate assembly for each of the three estates, which were called and dismissed by the king. It had no true power in its own right—unlike the English parliament it was not required to approve royal taxation or legislation instead it functioned as an advisory body to the king, primarily by presenting petitions from the various estates and consulting on fiscal policy.
Estabilish the Estates of Parliament

The Estates of Parliament was the legislature of the Kingdom of Alba or Scotland. The parliament, which is also referred to as the Estates of Scotland, the Community of the Realm, the Three Estates (Scots: Thrie Estaitis), the Scots Parliament or the auld Scots Parliament (English: old), met until prorogued sine die at the time of the Acts of Union in 1707. Thereafter the Parliament of Great Britain operated for both England and Scotland.
Estabilish the Cortes Generales

The Cortes Generales is the legislature of Spain. The system of Cortes arose in the Middle Ages as part of feudalism. A "Corte" was an advisory council made up of the most powerful feudal lords closest to the king.
Estabilish the Sabor
The Sabor was the legislature of Croatia.
Arrest the Templars
Arrest the Templars as heretics and seize their wealth and holdings.
Begin the plot
Make a Donation to the Patriarch.
Make a monetary donation to the Orthodox Patriarch, he will surely appreciate it and reward us with respect and sanctity.
Estabilish the Siete Partidas

The Siete Partidas was a Castilian statutory code with the intent of establishing a uniform body of normative rules for the kingdom. The codified and compiled text was originally called the Libro de las Leyes. It was not until the 14th century that it was given its present name, referring to the number of sections into which it is divided.
Estabilish the Statute of Merton

The Statute of Merton is considered to be the first English statute, and is printed as the first statute in The Statutes of the Realm. Amongst its provisions, the statute allowed a Lord of the Manor to enclose common land (provided that sufficient pasture remained for his tenants), and set out when and how manorial lords could assert rights over waste land, woods, and pastures against their tenants.
Estabilish the Quia Emptores

Quia Emptores was a statute that prevented tenants from alienating their lands to others by subinfeudation, instead requiring all tenants wishing to alienate their land to do so by substitution. Quia Emptores, along with its companion statute of Quo Warranto, was intended to remedy land ownership disputes and consequent financial difficulties that had resulted from the decline of the traditional feudal system during the High Middle Ages.
Enact the Ius Primae Noctis
The Ius Primae Noctis was a feudal right said to have existed in medieval Europe giving the lord to whom it belonged the right to sleep the first night with the bride of any one of his subjects.
Abdicate the Throne to your Heir
Host a Great Ball
Host a Great Ball at court, inviting all of your vassals and courtiers to the event.
Buy Knighthood for [This.GetBestName]
Bribe a lord to knight [This.GetBestName].
Knight [This.GetBestName]
[This.GetBestName] has proven himself to be a fine warrior. Perhaps we should officially recognize his skill.
Knight [This.GetBestName]
Buy Knighthood
Bribe a lord to knight [Root.GetBestName]
Establish a Personal Guard
Hire a group of loyal soldiers to create a personal household guard
Disband your Personal Guard
Disband your Personal Guard.
Command your Personal Guard
Give orders to your men

Let us hold a tournament the like of which is only rumoured. All Knights and Lords of the realm will gather at [Root.Capital.GetName]

Let us hold a tournament the like of which is only rumoured. All Knights and Lords of the realm will gather at [Root.Capital.GetName]

Hold a Local Tourney
Let us hold a small tournament for local Knights and Lords in [Root.Capital.GetName]
Show Tourney Medal winners
Show the medal winners of the latest Tourneys
Banish the Ius Primae Noctis
Banish the Ius Primae Noctis from your realm's lands.
Arrange an exchange of hostages
Arrange an exchange of hostages
Call Family out of Hiding
Removes "Hidden in countryside" from any of your dynasty or spouses at your location.
Demand Important Prisoners from Vassals
Any prisoners ranked above Baron are transferred to your dungeons.

column2: Seek out a Volva
Seek out a female practicer of Seid.
Hold a Blot
It is time to honour the Gods with food, drink and entertainment!
Go on a Raid!
It is time. Rally the men, get the longboats! It is time to do like our fathers and plunder our way to riches and glory!
Return Home
The harvest waits and our longboats are already full of gains.
Build the Third Temple
Build the Third Jewish Temple of Jerusalem.
Offer a sacrifice to the Cohen
Offer a sacrifice to the Cohen haGadol at the altar of the Third Temple.
Demand a Trial by Combat
Challenge [Root.Host.GetBestName] to a trial by combat in order to prove false his slanderous accusations!
Return Home from the Templar Service
Although your duty with the Templars is not finished yet, they will allow you to return home because of the importance you hold for your realm, if you were to request it.
Reform the Succession Laws
Reform your realm to allow the institution of the seniority and primogeniture succession laws.

Fabricate Evidence of Illegitimacy
column3: Fabriquer des preuves d'illégitimité

column2: Your investigation is not proceeding as quickly as you'd hoped. Perhaps a little bit of forgery might speed things up. Of course, anyone who sees through the fake is never going to believe anything else you might have to say.
column3: Votre enquête ne va pas aussi vite que vous l'espériez. Peut-être que quelques faux accélèrerait les choses. Bien sûr, si quelqu'un venait à découvrir la véritable nature de ces documents, il ne vous croirait plus un mot venant de vous.

column2: Go on Hajj to Mecca
column3: Partir en pèlerinage à La Mecque
column4: Geht auf Hadsch nach Mekka
column6: Ir al Hajj a La Meca

column2: Going on a pilgrimage to Mecca is one of the pillars of Islam, and this is something every able-bodied Muslim is expected to do once in his life.
column3: Réaliser un pèlerinage à La Mecque fait partie des cinq piliers de l'Islam. C'est une chose que tout musulman valide se doit de faire au moins une fois dans sa vie.
column4: Auf Wallfahrt nach Mekka zu gehen, ist eine der Säulen des Islam und es ist etwas,was von jedem nicht beeinträchtigten Moslem einmal in seinem Leben erwartet wird.
column6: Ir de peregrinación hacia La Meca es uno de los pilares del islam,  y es algo que todo musulmán que esté en condiciones físicas de hacerlo debe hacer una vez en su vida.
